Others: The Charlotte Hornets are prepared to facilitate potential trades around the NBA in exchange for future draft capital.
The Hornets are open to moving Cody Martin, Nick Richards, and Vasilije Micic for the right value.
The team's ideal outcome for their disappointing 2024-25 season would be landing the No. 1 overall pick in the 2025 NBA Draft.
Charlotte could come into the picture as a savior for teams like the Phoenix Suns, who are openly shopping Bradley Beal and Jusuf Nurkic.
The Hornets are viewed as a key team to help other deals get over the finish line before February 6th.
